views.markdown:
iOS 12 & arm64e support Fixed: Crash on load in certain situations.
New: Notification Center can now be set independently of the Control Center.
Fixed: Category Blacklist not blocking at all
Updated: Category Blacklist with a few categories I missed.
Added: Category Blacklist multiple language support. Categories use to only block when English was set as the language. Now every language is supported. Note: Only the currently selected language is shown in the menu.
iOS9 support Optimization.
Fixed: General Bugs, mostly Preferences related.
Fixed: Crash when installing on a fresh install. Devices that restored from backups were not affected.
New: Still need to access the CC/NC in a blocked app? The Activator options "Show Control Center" & "Show Notification Center" now take precedence over StopCCinApp. Perfect for the occasional times you still need access to your switches.
+iOS8 support. New: Option to hide the Notification Center

Fixed - Applist Dependency
7.1.1 Support

UI Facelift. Thanks @Dekesto
